contest-event.event-date:
Dec. 4, 1983 D Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest (Section C)
Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest (Section C) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest huddersfield-district-bba-contest-section-c
None
Huddersfield Town Hall, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England, UK Best soloist - Philip Hudson (Emley). Prizes - 1st £50 and trophy, 2nd £40, 3rd £30. 15 bands competed.
Aug. 20, 2014, 2:02 p.m. June 27, 2016, 10:53 a.m.
